last_episode_to_air.name: President Special PART.02
last_episode_to_air.overview: Part 2 of the two part Kamen Rider Zero-One recap special.

name: Kamen Rider Zero-One: President Special
original_name: 仮面ライダーゼロワン: プレジデント・スペシャル
overview: Izu suddenly appears before Aruto in a corridor passageway of Satellite Zea, however, there seems to be something off about her... Furthermore, besides her new long-haired hairstyle, she keeps on suddenly appearing and then disappearing from view, and the way she speaks seems unintelligible! Izu, who claims she is suffering from a systems failure, has apparently lost all of her data on Zero-One! So in order to update Izu's data on Zero-One, he decides to go back and revisit all of their previous battles, however...
